title: Week 8 Liquidity Mining Proposal
body:
This marks the 8th week of liquidity mining on Balancer v2. The Ballers propose the following changes which will go into effect 00:00 UTC Monday, July 12th, 2021. 

## ETHEREUM POOLS
Remove a Tier 1 slot, 2x Tier 3 slots and add 2x Tier 4 slot allocations for BAL/WETH 80/20. The pool will now receive 32,000 BAL per week total.

https://app.balancer.fi/#/pool/0x5c6ee304399dbdb9c8ef030ab642b10820db8f56000200000000000000000014

Allocate a Tier 3 slot to WBTC/renBTC/sBTC stablepool. This pool will now receive 2,500 BAL per week total.

https://app.balancer.fi/#/pool/0xfeadd389a5c427952d8fdb8057d6c8ba1156cc56000000000000000000000066

Allocate a Tier 3 slot and remove 2xTier 4 slots to BAL/GNO/WETH/DAI 25/25/25/25. This pool will now receive 2,500 BAL per week total. 

https://app.balancer.fi/#/pool/0x148ce9b50be946a96e94a4f5479b771bab9b1c59000100000000000000000054


## POLYGON POOLS

Remove a Tier 3 slot for 2,500 BAL from USDC/WETH/BAL/WMATIC 25/25/25/25. This pool will now receive 6,000 BAL per week total.

https://polygon.balancer.fi/#/pool/0x0297e37f1873d2dab4487aa67cd56b58e2f27875000100000000000000000002

Allocate a Tier 3 slot for 2,500 BAL for MAI/USDC/USDT/DAI stablepool. This pool will now receive 2,500 BAL per week total.

https://polygon.balancer.fi/#/pool/0x06df3b2bbb68adc8b0e302443692037ed9f91b42000000000000000000000012

Remove a Tier 4 slot for 1,000 BAL from USDC/WETH/LINK/BAL/AAVE 20/20/20/20/20. This pool will now receive 6,000 BAL per week total. 

https://polygon.balancer.fi/#/pool/0x36128d5436d2d70cab39c9af9cce146c38554ff0000100000000000000000008

Allocate a Tier 4 slot for 1,000 BAL to MTA/WMATIC/WETH. This pool will now receive 1,000 BAL per week total.

https://polygon.balancer.fi/#/pool/0x614b5038611729ed49e0ded154d8a5d3af9d1d9e00010000000000000000001d

Link to pull request: https://github.com/balancer-labs/frontend-v2/pull/541
author: 0x176001586fF17ad625Dc387557631710cf485f72
